mapper.sql: GOODS_ID, STORE_NO, CN_GOODS_NAME, CN_GOODS_INTRODUCTION, CN_GOODS_PICTURE_BIG, CN_GOODS_PICTURE_ROUND, US_GOODS_NAME, US_GOODS_INTRODUCTION, US_GOODS_PICTURE_BIG, US_GOODS_PICTURE_ROUND, GOODS_PRICE, GOODS_STATUS, GOODS_STOCK, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.select:
select
from TEA_GOODS_INFO where GOODS_ID = #{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DELETE_FLAG = '0'
mapper.insert: insert into TEA_GOODS_INFO (GOODS_ID, STORE_NO, CN_GOODS_NAME, CN_GOODS_INTRODUCTION, CN_GOODS_PICTURE_BIG, CN_GOODS_PICTURE_ROUND, US_GOODS_NAME, US_GOODS_INTRODUCTION, US_GOODS_PICTURE_BIG, US_GOODS_PICTURE_ROUND, GOODS_PRICE, GOODS_STATUS, GOODS_STOCK, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnGoodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnGoodsIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnGoodsPictureBig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnGoodsPictureRound,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usGoodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usGoodsIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usGoodsPictureBig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usGoodsPictureRound,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{goodsStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{goodsStock,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update TEA_GOODS_INFO
STORE_NO = #{storeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CN_GOODS_NAME = #{cnGoodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CN_GOODS_INTRODUCTION = #{cnGoodsIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CN_GOODS_PICTURE_BIG = #{cnGoodsPictureBig,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CN_GOODS_PICTURE_ROUND = #{cnGoodsPictureRound,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
US_GOODS_NAME = #{usGoodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
US_GOODS_INTRODUCTION = #{usGoodsIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
US_GOODS_PICTURE_BIG = #{usGoodsPictureBig,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
US_GOODS_PICTURE_ROUND = #{usGoodsPictureRound,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_PRICE = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GOODS_STATUS = #{goodsStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
GOODS_STOCK = #{goodsStock,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where GOODS_ID = #{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TEA_GOODS_INFO set STORE_NO = #{storeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CN_GOODS_NAME = #{cnGoodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CN_GOODS_INTRODUCTION = #{cnGoodsIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CN_GOODS_PICTURE_BIG = #{cnGoodsPictureBig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CN_GOODS_PICTURE_ROUND = #{cnGoodsPictureRound,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, US_GOODS_NAME = #{usGoodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, US_GOODS_INTRODUCTION = #{usGoodsIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, US_GOODS_PICTURE_BIG = #{usGoodsPictureBig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, US_GOODS_PICTURE_ROUND = #{usGoodsPictureRound,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_PRICE = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GOODS_STATUS = #{goodsStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, GOODS_STOCK = #{goodsStock,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where GOODS_ID = #{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from TEA_GOODS_INFO
DELETE_FLAG = '0'
and STORE_NO = #{storeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and CN_GOODS_NAME like '%'||#{cnGoodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and exists (select 1 from TEA_GOODS_CLASS where TEA_GOODS_INFO.GOODS_ID = TEA_GOODS_CLASS.GOODS_ID and TEA_GOODS_CLASS.CLASS_ID = #{classId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
